title: FOCUS
list: Only invest in areas we know
Work with market leading companies with proven profitability and growth

title: PARTNERSHIP
list: Clearly aligned interests among all stakeholders

title: DILIGENCE
list: Thorough understanding of key business fundamentals and value drivers
Become intimately familiar with the downside risks and upside opportunities

title: STRUCTURE
list: Appropriate capital structure to support growth with limited leverage
Disciplined and constructive board, advisors and outside resources

title: VALUES & VALUE
list: Values: trust, respect, integrity, balance & excellence
Value: consistent and transparent focus on building eventual exit value
